page.title: 11School Meals Cont
page.content: {OUR SCHOOL MEALS.}cont. I discovered that everyone liked to have a choice of dishes and wanted more.No-one wanted to go back to set meals. {QUESTIONAIRE Should cakes be priced higher or lower? Lower - 11, higher -1. Would you like more salads or more main meals? Salads - 0, main meals -12 Do you think prices have gone up a lot? Yes - 9, No - 3. Do you think too many people have packed lunches? Yes - 9, No - 3. Do you think the food is worth the money you pay?Yes - 4, No - 8. Do you think you should be allowed to go home for dinner? Yes - 11, No - 2.
